'''Promotional Videos''' are videos released by official ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' social media accounts that feature short slice-of-life scenes of many characters in a distinct drawn art style. They have been used as teasers for new regions and as celebratory releases. They are available as a [https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLqWr7dyJNgLJ79otw7N9CXQ_AU0Fm04aq playlist] on the official Genshin Impact YouTube channel.
